site.embed_html: <iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="applepodcasts" allow="autoplay *;encrypted-media *" allowfullscreen="" scrolling="no" src="https://embed.podcasts.apple.com/{$country}/podcast/episode/id{$podcast_id}?theme={{(($xf.versionId > 2030000 && $xf.style.isVariationsEnabled()) ? (($xf.visitor.style_variation) ? property_variation('styleType', $xf.visitor.style_variation) : 'auto') : property('styleType'))}}{{ $episode_id ? '&i=' . $episode_id : '' }}" style="height:{{ $episode_id ? '175' : '450' }}px;width:900px"></iframe>

<xf:if is="$error">{$error}<xf:else/><iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="bluesky" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/bluesky.min.html#{$url}#{$embedder}" style="height:600px;width:600px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe></xf:if>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="facebook" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" style="height:360px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/facebook.min.html#{{ $user ? $user . '/' . (($type=='r' or $type=='v') ? 'video' : 'post') . 's/' . ($id ? $id : ('pfbid' . $pfbid)) : ($id ? $type . $id : ('pfbid' . $pfbid)) }}"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="gist" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/gist.min.html#{$id}" style="height:180px;width:100%" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="googleplus" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" style="height:240px;width:450px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/googleplus.min.html#{{ $oid ? $oid : ('+' . $name) }}/posts/{$pid}"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="imgur" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>{let s=this.style,d=e.data.split(' ');s.height=d[0]+'px';s.width=d[1]+'px'};this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" style="height:400px;width:542px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/imgur.min.html#{{ $type=='album' ? 'a/' : '' }}{$id}"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="instagram" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" style="height:542px;width:542px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/instagram.min.html#{$id}#theme={{(($xf.versionId > 2030000 && $xf.style.isVariationsEnabled()) ? (($xf.visitor.style_variation) ? property_variation('styleType', $xf.visitor.style_variation) : 'auto') : property('styleType'))}}"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="jsfiddle" allowfullscreen="" scrolling="no" style="height:400px;width:100%" src="//jsfiddle.net/{$id}/{$revision}/embedded/{{ ((($xf.versionId > 2030000 && $xf.style.isVariationsEnabled()) ? (($xf.visitor.style_variation) ? property_variation('styleType', $xf.visitor.style_variation) : 'auto') : property('styleType'))=='light' or (($xf.versionId > 2030000 && $xf.style.isVariationsEnabled()) ? (($xf.visitor.style_variation) ? property_variation('styleType', $xf.visitor.style_variation) : 'auto') : property('styleType'))=='dark') ? ((($xf.versionId > 2030000 && $xf.style.isVariationsEnabled()) ? (($xf.visitor.style_variation) ? property_variation('styleType', $xf.visitor.style_variation) : 'auto') : property('styleType'))) . '/' : '' }}"></iframe>

<xf:if is="$invalid">@{$name}@{$invalid}/{$id}<xf:else/><iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="mastodon" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" style="height:300px;width:550px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/mastodon.min.html#{$name}{{ ($host and $host!='mastodon.social') ? '@' . $host : '' }}/{$id}"></iframe></xf:if>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="medium" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/medium.min.html#{$id}" style="height:316px;width:900px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="megaphone" allowfullscreen="" scrolling="no" style="height:200px;width:900px" src="https://player.megaphone.fm/{$id}{{ (($xf.versionId > 2030000 && $xf.style.isVariationsEnabled()) ? (($xf.visitor.style_variation) ? property_variation('styleType', $xf.visitor.style_variation) : 'auto') : property('styleType'))=='light' ? '?light=true' : '' }}"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="mixcloud" allowfullscreen="" scrolling="no" style="height:120px;width:900px" src="//www.mixcloud.com/widget/iframe/?feed=%2F{$id}%2F&light={{ (($xf.versionId > 2030000 && $xf.style.isVariationsEnabled()) ? (($xf.visitor.style_variation) ? property_variation('styleType', $xf.visitor.style_variation) : 'auto') : property('styleType'))!='dark' ? '1' : '' }}"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="pinterest" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/pinterest.min.html#{$id}" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2" style="height:360px;width:{{ ($id and contains($id,'/')) ? '730' : '345' }}px"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="reddit" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/reddit.min.html#{$id}{$path}#theme={{(($xf.versionId > 2030000 && $xf.style.isVariationsEnabled()) ? (($xf.visitor.style_variation) ? property_variation('styleType', $xf.visitor.style_variation) : 'auto') : property('styleType'))}}" style="height:165px;width:800px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="soundcloud" allowfullscreen="" scrolling="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url={{ $playlist_id ? 'https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/' . $playlist_id . '%3Fsecret_token%3D' . $secret_token : ($track_id ? 'https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/' . $track_id . '%3Fsecret_token%3D' . $secret_token : ((!contains($id,'://') ? 'https%3A//soundcloud.com/' : '') . $id)) }}" style="height:{{ ($playlist_id or ($id and contains($id,'/sets/'))) ? '450' : '166' }}px;width:900px"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="sporcle" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/sporcle.min.html#{$id}" style="height:535px;width:820px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="spotify" allow="encrypted-media" allowfullscreen="" scrolling="no" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/{$id|replace(':','/')}{$path}" style="border-radius:12px;height:{{ ($id|substr(0,7) == 'episode' or $id|substr(0,4) == 'show' or $id|substr(0,5) == 'track') ? '152' : '380' }}px;width:900px"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="spreaker" allowfullscreen="" scrolling="no" src="https://widget.spreaker.com/player?episode_id={$episode_id}&show_id={$show_id}&theme={{(($xf.versionId > 2030000 && $xf.style.isVariationsEnabled()) ? (($xf.visitor.style_variation) ? property_variation('styleType', $xf.visitor.style_variation) : 'auto') : property('styleType'))}}" style="height:{{ $episode_id ? '2' : '4' }}00px;width:900px"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="telegram" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" style="height:96px;width:500px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/telegram.min.html#{$id}#theme={{(($xf.versionId > 2030000 && $xf.style.isVariationsEnabled()) ? (($xf.visitor.style_variation) ? property_variation('styleType', $xf.visitor.style_variation) : 'auto') : property('styleType'))}}"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="threads" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/threads.min.html#{$id}" style="height:300px;width:550px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="tiktok" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/tiktok.min.html#{$id}" style="height:740px;width:325px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="tumblr" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/tumblr.min.html#{$key}/{$id}" style="height:300px;width:542px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="twitter" allow="autoplay *" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" style="height:350px;width:550px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/twitter.min.html#{$id}#theme={{(($xf.versionId > 2030000 && $xf.style.isVariationsEnabled()) ? (($xf.visitor.style_variation) ? property_variation('styleType', $xf.visitor.style_variation) : 'auto') : property('styleType'))}}"></iframe>

<xf:if is="$error">{$error}: {$url}<xf:if is="$profile_post_id">profile-posts/{$profile_post_id}<xf:elseif is="$resource_id"/>resources/{$resource_id}<xf:elseif is="$xfmg_album_id"/>media/albums/{$xfmg_album_id}<xf:else/>threads/{$thread_id}<xf:if is="$post_id">/post-{$post_id}</xf:if></xf:if><xf:else/><iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="xenforo" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" style="height:300px;width:100%" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/xenforo.min.html#{$url}{{ $profile_post_id ? 'profile-posts/' . $profile_post_id : ($resource_id ? 'resources/' . $resource_id : ($xfmg_album_id ? 'media/albums/' . $xfmg_album_id : ('threads/' . $thread_id . ($post_id ? '/post-' . $post_id : '')))) }}"></iframe></xf:if>
